name: Sunway Art and Craft Club
description:
# Sunway Art and Craft Club

## 🎨 Unleash Your Creativity
This club provides a space for students to express themselves through various forms of visual art.

## ✂️ Activities
- Watercolor, acrylic, and sketch workshops
- DIY craft sessions and exhibitions
- Collaborative mural and campus art projects

## 🖌 Open to All
No prior experience needed—just bring your creativity!
